Record.ClassificationPath: Digestive System Diseases/Gastrointestinal Diseases/Esophageal Diseases/Esophageal Perforation/Mallory-Weiss Syndrome
Record.Description: A condition characterized by mucosal tears at the ESOPHAGOGASTRIC JUNCTION, sometimes with HEMATEMESIS. Typically it is caused by forceful bouts of retching or VOMITING.
